fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may Prosecute a player during the day. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A Prosecuted player will be swapped with the lynched player today right before they are hanged, if no one was lynched, you force everyone to vote your target at the end of the day.
- If the Prosecuted player is lynched you do not lose a use of your ability.
- If you were to lynch a townie, you will instead publically reveal their role, but they permanently become defenseless, their defense will not be able to be raised above none.
